item.description: I missed SQLSaturday in Boston. I hope it comes back around.
item.content:encoded: I missed SQLSaturday in Boston. I hope it comes back around.

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: I'm glad that at least some people are allowed to get training... I wish I had that option. :(
item.content:encoded: I’m glad that at least some people are allowed to get training… I wish I had that option. 🙁

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
I am glad you work for a company that invests in its employees, I think we are also required to take a weeks of training a year.

I am also attending SQLSaturday 59 this weekend in NYC
